com.example.lab3_restapi

Class APIData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.lab3_restapi.APIData

  • public class APIData
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulate all the data coming from the OpenWeather JSON API and provide access to each of the three different forecast types used in the app : live, hourly (24h) and 7-day forecast. It also exposes a data class, APIData.WeatherData, for holding those forecast's information.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  APIData.WeatherData
      This class stores the forecast information like temperature, wind, etc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      APIData(org.json.JSONObject root, java.lang.String city)
      Default constructor to initialize the JSON parsing of weather data.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      APIData.WeatherData getCurrentWeatherData()
      Data for the Live tab.

    • Constructor Detail

      • APIData

        public APIData(org.json.JSONObject root,
               java.lang.String city)
        Default constructor to initialize the JSON parsing of weather data.
        Parameters:
        root - the JSON result of the API request
        city - used to keep track of the current city set by the user

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentWeatherData

        public APIData.WeatherData getCurrentWeatherData()
        Data for the Live tab.
        Returns:
        The live weather data.

      • getHourlyWeatherData

        public java.util.ArrayList<APIData.WeatherData> getHourlyWeatherData(int max_hourly_forecast)
        Data for the Today tab with one forecast per hour.
        Parameters:
        max_hourly_forecast - between 1 and 24 for the maximum hour lookahead from now
        Returns:
        The hourly forecast data with a maximum forecast of 24 hours.

      • getDailyWeatherData

        public APIData.WeatherData getDailyWeatherData(int day)
        Data for the individual day tabs.
        Parameters:
        day - between 0 and 6 for the forecasted day
        Returns:
        The weather forecast for this particular day.
